casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Joseph Maurice Craig No. 359P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. WITNESS my hand and the seal of the Supreme Court of North Carolina, this December 19, 2016.
December 8, 2016

Mr. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, For Joseph Maurice Craig.

Mr. David Learner, District Attorney, Ms. Amy Kunstling Irene, Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Ervin, J.

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 27th of September 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
